languages.text: "Однажды я по доброте душевной помог Аспис Чорде с одной из ее колоний — и вместо благодарности получил нож в спину. Не так уж много обещания Вольных Торговцев стоят в наше время".

traits.locale_text: "Однажды я по доброте душевной помог Аспис Чорде с одной из ее колоний — и вместо благодарности получил нож в спину. Не так уж много обещания Вольных Торговцев стоят в наше время".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once with one of her colonies out of sheer kindness, and she showed her gratitude by stabbing me in the back. The promises of Rogue Traders are not worth much these days."
languages.original_text: "Однажды я по доброте душевной помог Аспис Чорде с одной из ее колоний — и вместо благодарности получил нож в спину. Не так уж много обещания Вольных Торговцев стоят в наше время".

traits.locale_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once out of sheer kindness with one of her colonies, but all I've got was a stab in the back instead of gratitude. The promises of Rogue Traders don't have a lot weight to them nowadays."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once out of sheer kindness with one of her colonies, but all I've got was a stab in the back instead of gratitude. The promises of Rogue Traders don't have a lot weight to them nowadays."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once out of sheer kindness with one of her colonies, but all I've got has been a stab in the back instead of gratitude. The promises of Rogue Traders are not worth much these days."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once out of sheer kindness with one of her colonies, but all I've got has been a stab in the back instead of gratitude. The promises of Rogue Traders are not worth much these days."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once with one of her colonies out of sheer kindness, and she showed her gratitude by stabbing me in the back. The promises of Rogue Traders are not worth much these days."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once with one of her colonies out of sheer kindness, and she showed her gratitude by stabbing me in the back. The promises of Rogue Traders are not worth much these days."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «En una ocasión ayudé a Aspyce Chorda con una de sus colonias y su forma de darme las gracias fue traicionarme apuñalándome por la espalda. La palabra de un Comerciante Independiente no vale mucho en los tiempos que corren».
languages.original_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once with one of her colonies out of sheer kindness, and she showed her gratitude by stabbing me in the back. The promises of Rogue Traders are not worth much these days."

traits.locale_text: «En una ocasión ayudé a Aspyce Chorda con una de sus colonias por pura amabilidad, y lo único que recibí a cambio fue una puñalada por la espalda en vez de gratitud. La palabra de un Comerciante Independiente no vale mucho en los tiempos que corren».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “之前，我曾出于纯粹的善意，向阿斯拜丝·库尔达的殖民地伸出了援手，可她感谢我的方式就是在我背后捅刀子。如今，行商浪人的人情恐怕不值什么钱了。”
languages.original_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once with one of her colonies out of sheer kindness, and she showed her gratitude by stabbing me in the back. The promises of Rogue Traders are not worth much these days."

traits.locale_text: “我之前出于对某个殖民地纯粹的善意，也帮过阿斯拜丝·库尔达一次，可我并没有得到感激，只得到了背后捅来的刀子。如今，行商浪人的人情恐怕不值什么钱。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Un jour, par pure gentillesse, j'ai aidé Aspyce Chorda à régler des problèmes dans l'une de ses colonies, et elle m'a montré sa gratitude en me poignardant dans le dos. Les promesses des libres-marchands ne valent pas lourd, de nos jours. »
languages.original_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once with one of her colonies out of sheer kindness, and she showed her gratitude by stabbing me in the back. The promises of Rogue Traders are not worth much these days."

traits.locale_text: « Un jour, par pure gentillesse, j'ai aidé Aspyce Chorda à régler des problèmes dans l'une de ses colonies, et elle m'a montré sa gratitude en me poignardant dans le dos. Les promesses des libres-marchands ne valent pas lourd, de nos jours. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「アスパイス・コーダがコロニーを作ったとき、親切心から助けたことがある。だが、感謝の代わりに背中からさされただけだった。自由開拓者の約束など、最近では大した価値もないもんだ」
languages.original_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once with one of her colonies out of sheer kindness, and she showed her gratitude by stabbing me in the back. The promises of Rogue Traders are not worth much these days."

traits.locale_text: 「アスパイス・コーダがコロニーを作ったとき、親切心から助けたことがある。だが、感謝の代わりに背中からさされただけだった。自由開拓者の約束など、最近では大した価値もないもんだ」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Ich habe Aspyce Chorda einmal aus reiner Güte mit einer ihrer Kolonien geholfen, und sie hat mir aus Dankbarkeit einen Dolch in den Rücken gestoßen. Die Versprechen von Freihändlern sind heutzutage nicht mehr viel wert."
languages.original_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once with one of her colonies out of sheer kindness, and she showed her gratitude by stabbing me in the back. The promises of Rogue Traders are not worth much these days."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Aspyce Chorda einmal aus schierer Güte mit einer ihrer Kolonien geholfen, doch anstatt Dankbarkeit habe ich nur einen Dolch in den Rücken bekommen. Die Versprechen von Freihändlern sind heutzutage nicht mehr viel wert."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Aspyce Chorda'ya sırf iyi niyetimden kolonilerinden biriyle ilgili yardımım dokunmuştu. O da minnettarlığını beni sırtımdan bıçaklayarak gösterdi. Hür Tacirlerin verdikleri sözler, bugünlerde pek de kıymetli sayılmaz."
languages.original_text: "I did help Aspyce Chorda once with one of her colonies out of sheer kindness, and she showed her gratitude by stabbing me in the back. The promises of Rogue Traders are not worth much these days."
